data.title: List of films within films in Tamil cinema
meta_keywords: List of films within films in Tamil cinema
data.meta_description: Cinema can also create a world within which a fictional film can run. Here is the list of films within the films of Tamil cinema. The list also includes fictional films that are completed and films that are work in progress.
data.text: Dhool is a good vs evil film about a man Aarumugam (played by Vikram) and his accomplices’ fight against corrupt politicians, dirty cops and gangsters to fulfil the basic needs of his village. In order to teach a lesson to one of the above villains, Aarumugam and his team execute a plan to release a statement saying that the politician (played by Shayaji Shinde) was a big fan of the fictional adult film “Paapa Poatta Thaapa”, starring Shakila (of course). A riot ensues, where the politician gets scolded by his seniors in the outfit and his wife and children leaves his house.
